website_summaries.verdict: Users love this grill for its simple, sturdy, straightforward design. Best sized for a small family.
pros: Box-style charcoal grill with 4 levels of heat control
Chrome plating adds to the durability to cooking grid
cons: Grilling surface seems small to some
Slender sausages can slip out the back onto the charcoal

customer_reviews.title: First class customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the medium size which is great for 2 and adequate for 4. Unfortunately it was out of stock but a warehouse deal 'like new' was available at a bargain price. When it arrived the nuts and bolts along with the rubber feet were missing. Not wanting the hassle of returning I used my own nuts and bolts but had no feet. Quick click on product support and a few emails later and I'm sent a full pack of all the missing items. So well done product support and thank you Sofia at customer services. The BBQ by the way is great, very sturdy, perfect height and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Panoscouse

customer_reviews.title: Good value 👍
customer_reviews.text: A great BBQ for the price. Relatively easy to set up. Easy to use. Cleans with cold water surprisingly well. The grill part adjusts easy enough It is large enough so that a large disposable BBQ will fit into it if you want to use it like that.
customer_reviews.author: K Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: Not great durability unfortunately, it is a nice and easy to use little BBQ but although I bought the cover to protect it, here is the result after a winter outside .
customer_reviews.author: Lolo De Brightonia

customer_reviews.title: Best BBQ ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best BBQ I have ever purchased. Sturdy and very easy to clean, it looks brand new and has been used a couple of times. The grill area is enough for 3 to 4 people, a choice of different grilling heights avoids food being overcooked. The grill area is such good quality no food stuck to it and it was clean within minutes. The grill rack would also fit into a standard size dishwasher if required. Overall am very happy with this purchase and give it a 5 star rating!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss K.

customer_reviews.title: Tightly made fittings
customer_reviews.text: Nice little BBQ that is sturdy and easy to assemble. The exceptions are the four plastic feet which are almost too small, resulting in one splitting. Also the wooden handles for the grill, there are pre drilled holes but you need to tap them on with a rubber mallet. Inevitably the handle split along the grain. I’ve contacted the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S

customer_reviews.title: Great bbq.
customer_reviews.text: Liking this handy bbq having used it several times since bought. Easy to put together, very sturdy. Easy to clean. Small enough to go in the car boot and take away with you. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brindle

customer_reviews.title: Good BBQ !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent BBQ, bought mine towards the end of last summer & ive had maybe 6 or 7 BBQ’s since then. It works very well & I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grill too small for frame.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but with a ridiculous flaw - a two inch gap at the back of the grill that the fattest sausage can fall down onto the coals. I asked Dancook why and they failed to respond. MAKE THE GRILLS THE SAME SIZE AS THE BARBECUE!!
customer_reviews.author: neville m.

customer_reviews.title: Just superb, thanks
customer_reviews.text: Just superb, strong, compact, and solid. A party bbq pack just fits in the pan to make easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I was initially worried how stable the bbq would be with the unusual stand but there was no problem. The bbq is very well made and heavy duty. I was impressed by the quality of the grill. Outstanding value for money and nice to be able to purchase extra bespoke parts.
customer_reviews.author: A P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, very sturdy. A bit on the small side but ok for 4 people, just.
customer_reviews.author: kevin bell

customer_reviews.title: well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: used one on holiday and it worked very well, so bought my own. well made, easy and clean to use if you use a charcoal tray. big enough for two, bit small if cooking for four.
customer_reviews.author: PTC

customer_reviews.title: Bbq by Dancook
customer_reviews.text: Well made heavy gauge steel bbq, best bbq I’ve had nothing flimsy about this
customer_reviews.author: june johnston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, with stainless steel bottom
customer_reviews.text: Best bbq that I had to date. Compact, sturdy and big enough for our family. Stainless steel bottom will hopefully keep it functional for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Diabloid

customer_reviews.title: BUY A PROPER BBQ !
customer_reviews.text: WASTE OF MONEY ! is tiny ! buy a real one not a one made for dwarfs if you put 4 stakes there is full
customer_reviews.author: Vvm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BBQ's
customer_reviews.text: Really good, easy to clean. And the fact that you can adjust the height of the grill makes our BBQ perfect all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Varga

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We bought a smaller version of the same Dancook years ago which lasted about 5 or 6 summers. However, we've had this one for a few months and it has already broken! For some reason the frame has twisted and the grill rack doesn't fit in position on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hinchliffe

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad
customer_reviews.text: According to price it's a small grill and without shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Farooq B.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to assemble, since the instruction did not help. In the photo, it seems to be bigger than actually is. But it has good quality and, generally, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elis Marina

customer_reviews.title: Scandi quality
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Grill height adjustment good. Good, clean styling. Grill could be slightly deeper towards the back.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Slade

customer_reviews.title: Best BBQ on the market
customer_reviews.text: Amazing BBQ very sturdy and well built one of the best of the market
customer_reviews.author: Neil M

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, well made!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you want in a charcoal BBQ: well made, easy to use, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: THe Badger

customer_reviews.title: Great Bbq.
customer_reviews.text: Great bbq, easy to clean. Big enough for a large family.
customer_reviews.author: MR C J FIELDING

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic BBQ for the price .. well made and a great design.... thanks dancook 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great small bbq
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for us, small and functional. Easy to put together and sturdy... The quality of the material seems very robust. Negative points: The cooking hight is quite low (not a problem, but didn't realise until it was up how low it would feel). The gap between the back of the grilling shelf and the back panel is quite big (appx 10cm), and with a small cooking area you can easily knock things off, but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: An excellent, well made and well thought out BBQ
customer_reviews.text: An excellent, well made and well thought out BBQ. Quality materials for the price, and well engineered - precise cutouts and bolt lengths. Only criticism is a small gap between the main grill and back of the BBQ, meaning sausages can meet their doom! For the £40 I paid, I did not find another product even close in terms of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gagandeep

customer_reviews.title: Dancook
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant BBQ really solid construction,I've got two of them now,both sizes plus loads of bits and pieces,can't recommend them enough
customer_reviews.author: T.J.CARTER

customer_reviews.title: Really well made BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Put it in my large fireplace in Conservatory and cook with it in winter. Got two of them. Very well made. Sturdy. Delighted
customer_reviews.author: alexander campbell

customer_reviews.title: Could have some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Needs more airflow under the charcoal as a few time this bbq has taken a very long time to get going or cook food on. Have since made my own separate raised grill for charcoal to rest on which has improved the bbq massively.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dancook 7100 - Medium Barbecue Box Grill.
product_meta.description:
Introducing the Dancook 7100 Barbecue Box Grill (product no. 101 501). This perfectly designed and engineered box grill has a primary cooking grid measuring 50cm x 25cm. It comes with an anthracite enamel with teflon surface for a quality finish that is easy to clean. The aluminium coated tray is heat resistant and ideally equipped to hold hot charcoal or briquets. The extremely sturdy 6mm chrome plated grid is strong, durable and ideal for holding larger, heavy cuts of meat and poultry. Simply use the grid handles to lift and rest the grid at any of the 4 levels to control the intensity of heat to the grilling area for great, authentic cooking results. Built to exceptionally high standards, this product comes with a 2 year warranty. To protect and maintain your box grill over a life-time, we recommend you purchase the custom made cover (product no. 130 124). Finally, we think it's worth knowing that you can also vertical Barbecue using a barbecuespit (product no. 130 105) and barbecue motor (product no. 130 111 mains powered or 130 110 battery powered) - both available as optional accessories from Dancook. Dancook - Danish design made in Denmark.

BOX CONTAINS
Barbecue Grill
feature_bullets: Extra-thick 6mm chrome plated grid - durable and ideal for holding larger, heavy cuts of meat and poultry.
4 heat control levels - simple, effective heat intensity and cooking control.
Warranty - 10 years on stainless steel parts. 2 years on all other parts.
